short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Silence unwanted noise on Quora profiles instantly with this Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve the Quora web experience.

* See "Answers", not "All Related" by default.

* Find Original Poster button on Answer and Log pages

* One-button mute and block on a profile page.
